sentence.Network_en: They believe he will suffer damnation for his sins.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们相信他会因他的罪孽而遭厄运的.

sentence.Network_en: The Titans were hurled down there by Zeus to suffer eternal damnation.
sentence.Network_cn: 提坦诸神就被宙斯拉到这儿承受永久的磨难.

sentence.Network_en: God is willing to snatch your soul from eternal damnation.
sentence.Network_cn: 上帝是愿意把你的灵魂从永恒的地狱中打救出来的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...o inflict loss upon, to condemn, punish 责备, 谴责, 惩罚damnation n. 毁灭, 遭天罚dat dit
they believe he will suffer damnation for his sins .他们相信他会因他的罪孽而遭厄运的。
异端 heretic被罚下地狱 damnation报复vengeance

he found it quite simple that certain breaches of the written law should be followed by eternal suffering , and he accepted , as the process of Xivilization , social damnation .他觉得对成文法的某些破坏要受永久的处罚，这是很容易理解的，他同意社会把有些人罚入地狱是一种文明的做法。

list.abs: woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .你们这假冒为善的文士和法利赛人有祸了，因为你们侵吞寡妇的家产，假意作很长的祷告，你们要受更重的刑罚。
Haggard - Heavenly damnation 神圣的诅咒 Suffering dementia 失神的症状 Unchains the secret's bearer 暂时解放了这预言者,免于预知死亡的痛苦 Unholy visions &quot.
"eternal damnation"怎么说合适... ... Eternal Damnation 永恒的诅咒; First Damnation 黑色金属.
the bad man will suffer eternal damnation ., 坏人将会受到永远的惩罚.
a true damnation , when i turned away ., 一个真实的诅咒 , 当我转身离开时.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin dam(p)natio(n-), from the verb dam(p)nare 'inflict loss on' (see damn)

entry.tran: (某些宗教中人死后的)罚入地狱
entry.def: According to some religions, if someone suffers damnation, they have to stay in hell for ever after they have died because of their sins.

example.tran: 对死后永堕地狱的恐惧

entry.tran: (表示愤怒或不耐烦) 该死，见鬼去吧
entry.def: Some people say 'damnation!' to express anger or impatience.

means.word_mean: 2. the state of being condemned to eternal punishment in Hell

auth_sentence.content: We must not impute damnation to a human soul.
auth_sentence.res_content: We must not impute damnation to a human soul.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We must not impute damnation to a human soul.

auth_sentence.content: Man is the reason man sinned and fell into damnation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Man is the reason man sinned and fell into damnation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Man is the reason man sinned and fell into damnation.

auth_sentence.content: He exists i have earned myself eternal hell and damnation.
auth_sentence.res_content: He exists i have earned myself eternal hell and damnation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He exists i have earned myself eternal hell and damnation.
